13.01.09.name: connect20/GroupSwitcher
13.01.09.description: The GroupSwitcher app enables you to assign your customers to specific groups. This can be done individually or when certain events occur like the purchase of a specific product or when the customer reaches a predetermined turnover goal. All rules support specified customer groups which the customer has to belong to for the rule to apply.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
